1409950.name: Fantasy Grounds - Dawn of the Daikaiju
1409950.description:
Dawn of the Daikaiju

The world changed in 1953--a radioactive monster rose from Hudson Bay to terrorize New York. Now these "daikaiju" save the world!
In
Dawn of the Daikaiju , players take on the roles of giant monsters called kaiju or daikaiju (the terms are used interchangeably and both mean "giant monster"). Though daikaiju range in origin from oversized insects and dinosaurs to bio-engineered alien weapons, they somehow recognize in each other a single species. Even daikaiju from different worlds work together in packs.
Dawn of the Daikaiju contains a Plot Point Campaign, Adventure Generator, specially adapted race creation rules, and new Edges and Hindrances--and it's all in Kaiju Scale!
It requires the Savage Worlds core rules to play.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Michael Grancey
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
